entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location mentioned in the text as a place Harry wants to get into.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are entities that block Harry's path to Hogsmeade.

relationships.description: Snape has access to Hogsmeade, as he is able to reveal the secret path on the map.
Snape can defeat Dementors, as he is able to command them to yield information.
